Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.Cards.CardStack
      • com.company.Cards.Deck
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StandardDeck, Wildcards

    public abstract class Deck
extends CardStack

    Deck

    This abstract class provides extra functionality needed for a Deck rather than a CardStack.

    15/10/2018

      • dealCard

        public Card dealCard()
        Returns:
        One card from the top of the deck

      • dealCards

        public java.util.List<Card> dealCards(int cardsToDeal)
                               throws NotEnoughCardsException
        Parameters:
        cardsToDeal - Number of cards to deal.
        Returns:
        The desired number of cards in the form of a List<Card>]
        Throws:
        NotEnoughCardsException - When there is not enough cards to deal.

      • restock

        public void restock(java.util.List<Card> restockCards)
        Adds a list of cards back into the deck and shuffles it. Does not add any wildcards used back into the deck.
        Parameters:
        restockCards - List of cards to be restocked into the deck.
